response.original_title: The World Series: History of the Fall Classic
response.overview: Narrated by Bob Costas and crafted by the filmmakers of Major League Baseball Productions this is the definitive documentary on the World Series, the madness, triumphs, and exhilarating moments that will be remembered for the ages. The expertly blended archival footage, thrilling game action and more than 100 interviews with players, managers, writers, broadcasters, and historians create an exciting and comprehensive chronicle of the Fall Classic.
response.tagline: A thorough history of the World Series
response.title: The World Series: History of the Fall Classic
